items.name: Palak Chole Masala
items.description: Chickpeas cooked with spicy spinach based gravy topped with fresh herbs
items.extra: Make it a meal served with rice + achar + side salad + papad

items.name: Tawa Anda Pepper Fry with Pav
items.description: Hard boiled and then pan fried eggs in spicy, hot & tangy blend of sauces, stir fried in butter, onions & tomatoes served with 2 buns + pickled onions + salad

items.name: Ragada Pattice
items.description: Potato patty made with different spices and herbs teamed in a chickepea gravy topped with a tangy, sweet and spicy sauce, chopped fresh coriander, mint and onion. A lip smacking Indian street food (2 tikkies)

items.name: Tandoori Chicken
items.description: Roasted chicken thigh piece marinated with yogurt and tandoori spice mixes, cooked on coal served with 1 pita bread + green chutney and onions

items.name: Paneer Bhurji
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked with onion and tomatoes in a lip smacking spice mix. A comfort meal for the soul.
items.extra: Make it meal served with 2 parathas + salad + achar + papad

items.name: Rajasthani Achari Murgh
items.description: Slow cooked chicken curry with pickled spices, dried red chillies in thick onion & tomato based sauce
items.extra: Make it a meal served with 2 parathas + papad + salad

items.name: Vada Pav
items.description: Mumbai's street food version of Indian burger. Boiled potatoes based spicy patty containing green chillies, onion, garlic, ginger and other spices sandwiched inside a soft bun smeared with spicy garlic chutney with a zing of green chilli.

items.name: Oats Rava Idli
items.description: A healthy version of savoury rice cakes made with oats, semolina, roasted cashews, curry leaves and yogurt steamed to perfection. Served with coconut chutney (4 Idlis )

items.name: Dal Makhni
items.description: One of the most loved dishes of India. Black gram slow cooked with warm spices, topped with zesty onion, tomato and garlic toppings and cream
items.extra: Make it a meal served with rice + achar + papad + pickled onions and chilli

items.name: Prawns Balcho
items.description: A Goan delicacy with sweet, spicy and tangy flavours that will give your taste buds a ride
items.extra: Make it a meal with served with  2 parathas + side salad + papad

items.name: Bhel Puri
items.description: Puffed rice teamed with onion, tomato, chillies, lipsmacking sweet-tangy tamarind sauce and spicy-zesty green sauce, topped with some roasted peanuts and fresh coriander

items.name: Oats Banana Pancake
items.description: A healthier pancake made of oats and banana teamed with some mixed berry compote

items.name: Coconut Beetroot Pulao
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked in coconut milk and beetroot with some roasted cashews, onion and curry leaves. A meal to warm the soul served with papad + achar

items.name: Malvani Mussels Masala
items.description: A dish from the coastal regions of Maharashtra. Mussels cooked in a lip smacking and flavourful sauce of caramalised onion, coconut and fresh ground special spice mix
items.extra: Make it a meal with served with rice + papad + achar + side salad

items.name: Crispy Veg Cutlet
items.description: Potatoes, flatterned rice, onion, garlic, ginger and green chillies mixed with spices and shallow fried in oil. Served with a side of spicy green chutney

items.name: Beetroot Thepla
items.description: Whole wheat dough made with different spices, herbs and beetroot puree; rolled into thin sheets of Indian flat bread and smeared with ghee. Served with tangy, sweet and spicy tomato chutney

items.name: Malai Kofta
items.description: Soft balls made of potato and Indian cottage cheese mixed with different spices and deep fried cooked in a creamy sauce made with onion, tomato and cashew topped with fresh cream and corriander
items.extra: Make it a meal served with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Chettinad Iraichi Kulambu
items.description: Spicy slow cooked lamb curry from the south of India with aromatic & fragnant spices topped with crispy fried garlic
items.extra: Make it a meal served with rice + papad + achar

items.name: Kheema Samosa
items.description: Minced chicken cooked with onion and spice mixes stuffed in a pastry sheet and deep fried till crisp. Served with green chutney and picked onions. (2 samosas)

items.name: Moong Dosa
items.description: Savoury sprouted moong crepes. A healtheir version of the Indian rice crepes. Rich in protine and fiber. Served with coconut chutney

items.name: Paneer Chilli with Veg Fried Rice
items.description: Most loved Indo-Chinese vegetarian dish. Indian cottage cheese cooked with capsicum and onion petals in lip smacking Indo-Chinese gravy served fried rice

items.name: Chicken Chilly with Fried Rice
items.description: A favourite Indo-Chinese dish made with fried chicken cooked in flavourful Indo-Chinese gravy with aromatic flavours. Served with fried rice containing chicken and assorted veggies in Indo-Chinese spices

items.name: Dahi Bhalla
items.description: A lip smacking street food from Delhi. Fried dough balls smeared with tangy cool yogurt and sweet, spicy and tangy sauces, pomagranate, sev and zesty spices

items.name: Pongal
items.description: Savory dish made of rice and lentils topped with some fried cashew, chilies and ghee. A dish from the state of South India. Served with a side of coconut chutney and sambar.

items.name: Paneer Jalfrezi
items.description: Soft and flavourful Indian cottage cheese cooked with onion, tomato and bell peppers in flavourful spices. A comfort meal for the soul.
items.extra: Make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad.

items.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
items.description: Juicy chicken breast roasted and cooked in a thick gravy made of onion, tomato and fresh spices. A flavourful dish with the right amount of spices and tang.
items.extra: Make it a meal with 1 paratha + rice + papad + achar.

items.name: Crispy Veg Cutlet
items.description: A perfect snack to have with your chilled beer or hot tea. Boiled veggies mixed with spices and chilies and rolled in roasted vermecilli and pan fried for a crisp. Served with spicy green chutney (4 cutlets)

items.name: Oats Rava Idlis
items.description: A healthy version of savoury rice cakes made with oats, semolina, roasted cashews, curry leaves and yogurt steamed to perfection. Served with coconut chutney (4 Idlis )

items.name: Bharwa Baigan
items.description: Stuffed baby eggplant dish cooked in aromatic blend of spices, onion and tomatoes. The sauce is spicy, tangy and full of flavour to quench the craving for spicy food.
items.extra: Make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Malabari Prawns Curry
items.description: Prawns curry loaded with rich and edgy flavours of the South-Indian cuisine. It's prawns cooked with chillies, tomatoes, tamarind and coconut milk. A perfect blend of spicy and tangy flavours.
items.extra: Make it a meal with rice + 1 paratha + achar + papad

items.name: Vada Pav Quesadilla
items.description: A creative way to eat the famous Mumbai street food. Mashed potatoes cooked with spices and stuffed in between chapatis topped with spicy garlic chutney and onion and grilled on a pan.

items.name: Tandoori chicken
items.description: Roasted chicken thigh piece marinated with yogurt and tandoori spice mixes, cooked on coal served with 1 pita bread + green chutney and onions

items.name: Bhuna Mushroom Masala
items.description: Whole button mushrooms simmered in a sauce of cramalised onions, yogurt and spices; cooked to perfection and topped with fresh corriander.
items.extra: Make it a meal with 2 paratha + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Lamb Kulumbu
items.description: A spicy lamb dish popular in the southern part of India. Cooked in a base of onion, tomato and freshly ground special spice mix and coconut. A warm and flavourful dish with melt pieces of lamb that melt in your mouth.
items.extra: Make it a meal with rice + 1 paratha + achar + papad

items.name: Dabeli Tacos
items.description: A twist to the mouth watering street food. Mashed potatoes with spices and tangy sauces stuffed in between taco shells topped with desicated coconut and corriander.

items.name: Palak Garlic Dal Kichidi
items.description: A comfort meal and food for the soul. Spinach cooked with lentils and rice in ghee and topped with crispy garlic bits and spices. Served with achar + papad.

items.name: Veg Pulao
items.description: Assorted veggies cooked together with fragrant basmati rice and flavoured with fresh garam masala and whole spices, topped with fried cashew in ghee.
items.extra: Make it a meal with dal tadka + achar + papad + kochimber (indian salad)

items.name: Sali Boti
items.description: A Parsi delicacy with soft scullent lamb pieces cooked to perfection with spices giving it the perfect flavour topped with fried potato shreds. A delicacy that you do not want to miss out on.
items.extra: Make it a meal with rice + 1 paratha + achar + papad

items.name: Crispy Chilli Potatoes
items.description: Crispy fried poptatoes cooked with Indo-Chinese sauces with ginger and garlic for a perfect snack.

items.name: Anda Paratha
items.description: Grated boiled eggs mixed with spices and herbs stuffed inside whole wheat dough, flattened and cooked to achieve a perfect crust. Served with a side of achar and tomato chutney. (2 parathas)

items.name: Egg Pulao
items.description: Hard boiled egg sauted with assorted veggies, whole Indian spices and fresh garam masala cooked together with fragrant Basmati rice. Served with side yogurt dip + achar + papad.

items.name: Goan Chorizo Pulao
items.description: A goan dish with Chorizo cooked with onion, tomato and spices combined with rice and whole spices. A complete meal with the perfect balance of spice and warmth served with some cool yogurt raita and papad.

items.name: Bombay Cheese Chilli Toast
items.description: A street food favourite among Mumbaikars. Spicy stuffing of potatoes, capsicum and green chutney stuffed together in a bread topped with loads of cheese and grilled to perfection. Served with green chutney and tomato ketchup.

items.name: Puttu and Kadala Curry
items.description: A dish from the state of Kerala. Steamed rice flour with bits of grated coconut served with spicy flavourful black chickpea churry. A perfect dish for a light dinner.

items.name: Paneer Makhni Dum Briyani
items.description: Soft and juicy Indian cottage cheese cooked in thick creamy onion, tomato and cashew based gravy together with fragrant Basmati rice finished to perfection on a slow flame. Served with side yogurt dip + achar + papad.

items.name: Hyderabadi Murg Biryani
items.description: A delicious and spicy dum style kacchi biryani. Soft succulent chicken pieces with aromatic spices, fried onions and fragrant basmati rice. A combination to die for! Served with yogurt raita + acahar + papad.

items.name: Dahi ke Kebab
items.description: A vegetarian kebab made of hung curd, paneer and spice mices coated with bread crumbs and fried to get a perfect crispy outside and gooey inside. Served with some spicy green chutney.

items.name: Chicken Kheema Paratha
items.description: Minced chicken cooked with spices and herbs and stuffed in between dough, flattened and cooked to get the perfect layer of crust. Served with achar and tomato chutney. (2 parathas)
